bill.summary:
Tribal Uranium Exposure Treatment Enhancement Act of 2018
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 1961 to authorize the Department of Agriculture to award grants for cancer treatments to Indians who reside on reservations where uranium mining or milling occurred and whose health was impacted by the mining or milling.
